author: The Associated Press
title: Idaho activist arrested for refusing to leave playground
description: An anti-vaccine activist was arrested in Idaho Tuesday after repeatedly refusing to leave a playground that had been closed because of the coronavirus pandemic
content:
BOISE, Idaho -- 
An anti-vaccine activist was arrested in Idaho after she repeatedly refused orders by police to leave a playground that had been closed because of the coronavirus pandemic.
